articles.title: Marco Sturm: Bruins gave Oilers ‘too much respect’ out on TD Garden ice
articles.description:
"That's the one thing. I wished we got a little bit out of our comfort [zone] a little bit and pushed a little bit harder."

The post Marco Sturm: Bruins gave Oilers ‘too much respect’ out on TD Garden ice appeared first on Boston.com.
